channel.title: Server editing problem
channel.description: How come each time i edit my server e.g add colour to str bonus and crap and tyr make varrock pk or something, I do everything right but doesn't change? I compile after I do the stuff two? Is it because my 100 errors?

item.title: Server editing problem
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

Yes, errors will not save things that you change.

Fix 100 errors, or just redownload your source.

After it says that you have no errors, edit the stuff again, save, compile, and it should work then

Read full topic
